kpi.name: M8014C17

kpi_info.title: Failed Inter eNB S1-Handover preparations due to other reason
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Inter eNB S1-based Handover preparations due to the reception of an S1AP: HANDOVER PREPARATION FAILURE message with a cause other than "No Radio Resources Available in Target Cell." UPDATED: This counter is updated following the reception of an S1AP: HANDOVER PREPARATION FAILURE message from the MME to the source eNB with any other cause than "No Radio Resources Available in Target Cell" in case that this message is received in response to the preparation of an Inter eNB Handover.

kpi.kpi_alias: Failed Inter eNB S1-Handover preparations due to other reason
